metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to understand a charge on my recent bill. It's much higher than usual.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. Could you please provide your account number so I can access your billing information?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's 1234567890. Honestly, I'm a bit frustrated because I haven't changed my plan or anything.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I'm looking into your account now. Ah, I see a charge related to international calls. Can you confirm if you made any international calls during the billing cycle?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I don't think so! Not that I can recall. Is there a detailed log of the calls? I need to know exactly what the charge is for - maybe it's a scam call.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can definitely provide you with the call logs. However, the system is experiencing a slight delay at the moment. I am currently able to see the destination numbers and call durations, but not the exact time. It will take a few moments to generate the full details. I apologize for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's fine. Please send the detailed log once it's available. Thanks for your help.
